dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'MM/DD/YYYY') before_dt, TRIM(TO_CHAR(:DAYS1,'999,999,990')) v1days, TRIM(TO_CHAR(:DAYS2,'999,999,990')) v2days, TRIM(TO_CHAR(:DAYS3,'999,999,990')) v3days FROM DUAL

SELECT sp.servprov_xid carrier, loc.location_name carrier_name, v1.cntr_cnt v1_count, v1.cntr_wt v1_weight, v2.cntr_cnt v2_count, v2.cntr_wt v2_weight, v3.cntr_cnt v3_count, v3.cntr_wt v3_weight FROM servprov sp LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS1) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v1 ON sp.servprov_gid = v1.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS2) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v2 ON sp.servprov_gid = v2.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS3) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v3 ON sp.servprov_gid = v3.servprov_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON sp.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN contact con ON loc.location_gid = con.location_gid AND con.is_primary_contact = 'Y' AND con.external_system_gid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT SUM(v1.cntr_cnt) v1_count_total, SUM(v1.cntr_wt) v1_weight_total, SUM(v2.cntr_cnt) v2_count_total, SUM(v2.cntr_wt) v2_weight_total, SUM(v3.cntr_cnt) v3_count_total, SUM(v3.cntr_wt) v3_weight_total FROM servprov sp LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS1) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v1 ON sp.servprov_gid = v1.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS2) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v2 ON sp.servprov_gid = v2.servprov_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT a.servprov_gid, SUM(a.unit_net_weight_base) cntr_wt, COUNT(a.s_ship_unit_gid) cntr_cnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sprov.servprov_gid, ssu.s_ship_unit_gid, ROUND(ssu.unit_net_weight_base) unit_net_weight_base FROM servprov sprov INNER JOIN shipment s ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER','SCOULAR.FOBCARR') AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:BEFORE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') - :DAYS3) AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) a GROUP BY a.servprov_gid) v3 ON sp.servprov_gid = v3.servprov_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON sp.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN contact con ON loc.location_gid = con.location_gid AND con.is_primary_contact = 'Y' AND con.external_system_gid IS NOT NULL
